original_text: And he did not permit him but said to him, “Go home to your friends and tell them how much the Lord has done for you, and how he has had mercy on you.”
korean_text: 허락하지 아니하시고 그에게 이르시되 집으로 돌아가 주께서 네게 어떻게 큰 일을 행하사 너를 불쌍히 여기신 것을 네 가족에게 알리라 하시니

sentences.original_text: And he did not permit him
how much the Lord has done for you
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 너에게 얼마나 큰 일을 행하셨는지

sentences.original_text: and how he has had mercy on you
